sentence: 50% say today's digital technologies make writing it EASIER
for them to shape digital or improve technologies student writing
Do today's digital technologies make it EASIER or MORE DIFFICULT for you as a
teacher to shape or improve student writing, or do they have NO IMPACT?
Source: The Pew Research Center's Internet & American Life Project Online
Survey of Teachers March 7 to April 23 2012 Based on a non-representative
sample of2, .067 middle and high school teachers
